title: How can i put the game in french ?
body: hello i moved to eastern canada. I would like to have the game in French. Because playing with another language is like playing with other characters, and I am very attached to their personalities and their dialogue. I'll stop playing if it's not possible, thinking it's stupid to not be able to change. Is there a solution with this launcher? ty for your answers

replies.body: Lol its so stupid. Just because NA want to put some retard politic ideas in his international game. Never saw this in a game before. I will stop the game after 4years of pleasure. Stupid as fk, anyway ty for the answer.

I can definitely understand that desire to play in the language you're most comfortable with, but sadly if you are playing on the NA server there is not an option to swap to French for the client. EUW right now is still the only region that has implemented French support for the client. :(
